title: Like A Wisp of Steam: Steampunk Erotica
description: edited by Cecilia Tan and J. Blackmore.Five erotic steampunk stories. Lust & leaping 'technologie' meet in a Victorian era that never was. Jason Rubis, Thomas S. Roche, Vanessa Vaughn, Peter Tupper, and Kaysee Renee Robichaud create fascinating tales of airships, corsetry, mad scientists, and drama. [ explicit sexuality.]
author: Cecilia Tan
